title: Entertainment Live: George Cole tributes; Cumberbatch as Hamlet - BBC News
summary: reaction to george cole 's death at 90 .
strong debut for bbc one 's bake off .

documents.title: that 'll do , donkey
text: that 's all we have time for on a day on which we 've rapped to the great british bake off , asked if it 's right to review a play before its official opening night and bid a fond farewell to actor george cole .
we 'll leave you with some rare test footage that gives an idea what chris farley might have sounded like as shrek had he lived long enough to voice the title role in the hit animated film .
it 's taken from a documentary about the larger-than-life comedian , called i am chris farley .
see you tomorrow , when we 'll all be having waffles .

documents.title: gordon comes out the closet
text: gordon the gopher , last seen disappearing into the back of the bbc broom cupboard , is to make his tv comeback .
the rodent is being resurrected for a new web series that will air on the bbc website 's taster section - and this time he will speak .
jokingly consigned to rehab by his erstwhile co-star and former going live !
presenter phillip schofield , the series sees gordon come out of treatment and confront schofield , whom he maintains `` ditched '' him .
writer-director ryan mcdermott said the idea was born after his grandmother found an old replica gordon puppet in her loft .
`` it got me thinking , '' he told the sun .
`` phillip and the puppeteer , paul smith , own gordon and both really liked the idea , so they allowed us to do it .
`` i think they like it because gordon 's naughty and swears , '' he added .
the rodent will be voiced by warwick davis .
author: The Sun

documents.title: powerful ora ?
text: pop star rita ora releases her new single on friday - a pop duet with chris brown called body on me .
the track is a follow-up to her recent release poison , which peaked at number three in the official uk singles chart .
according to her spokespersons , `` the sultry track beautifully melds their two distinctive voices to underscore the theme of instinctual desire '' .

documents.title: bosses salute 'wonderful ' cole
text: director general tony hall has paid tribute to the `` wonderful actor '' george cole , above with sir david jason
`` he has a very special place in the public 's affection .
he will be greatly missed , '' said lord hall .
`` growing up i never missed minder , '' said danny cohen , director of bbc television .
`` it was one of the most loved and cherished dramas of its generation , with george cole at its heart .
`` british television and cinema salutes george cole . ''

documents.title: one dog and his boy
text: the new mr peabody and sherman show - a new animated series from dreamworks animation - is set to debut on netflix on 9 october .

the 13-episode , half-hour series is based on a string of four-minute shorts from the 1960s created by jay ward , of rocky and bullwinkle fame , that dreamworks adapted into a full-length feature last year .
in the show , brilliant bespectacled canine mr peabody and his adopted son sherman travel through time and meet famous historical figures .
the animated series will sees the duo host a late-night comedy show , broadcast from their swanky manhattan penthouse in front of a live studio audience .
guests from bygone eras will include mozart , napoleon and edgar allan poe .
author: Variety

documents.title: stolen stradivarius recovered
text: a stradivarius violin that disappeared without a trace after it was stolen in 1980 from violin virtuoso roman totenberg has been found , his daughter nina totenberg has tweeted .
the violin - which was made in 1734 and is known as the ames stradivarius - was stolen from mr totenberg 's office at the longy school of music in cambridge , massachusetts .
it turned up in new york in june , after a woman from california sought a valuation for the instrument which she had inherited from her late ex-husband .
ms totenberg - legal affairs correspondent for npr news - said her father , who died in 2012 , had always suspected the culprit .
she said the family planned to have the ames stradivarius restored and sold .
we 're going to make sure that it 's in the hands of another great artist who will play it in concert halls all over the world , '' she said .
a police official said that no charges are expected to be filed in connection with the case .
read more on this story .
a call from the fbi ended a 35-year mystery about my father 's stolen stradivarius .

documents.title: langella returns to broadway
text: three-time tony winner frank langella will be back on broadway next spring in the title role of the father .
the play , a study of dementia by florian zeller , has garnered acclaim in europe , winning france 's moliere award for a new work of theatre .
a recent british production -
previews of the broadway version will begin in late march , with an opening night set for 12 april at the samuel j friedman theatre .
langella - who previously starred in the award-winning frost/nixon - was last seen on the broadway stage in terence rattigan 's man and boy in 2011 .

documents.title: morrissey heads for grantchester
text: here 's a of neil morrissey with robson green and james norton on the set of itv 's grantchester .
the men behaving badly star will play a father whose teenage daughter dies in sus circumstances in the second series of the 1950s drama , to air on itv in 2016 .
morrissey said he was `` happy to be sporting a funky fifties moustache '' in the show - `` my first foray into top-lip decoration since i started acting . ''
nigel planer and nicky henson are among other new cast additions to the popular period crime drama .

documents.title: french star , greek play , scottish theatre
text: if you missed juliette binoche 's antigone when it played at the barbican in london - or forgot to set the video when it was
the oscar-winning french actress will be reprising her acclaimed performance as sophocles ' tragic heroine at the king 's theatre
here 's a of binoche underneath the impressive fresco that the scottish artist john byrne created for this historic venue in 2013 .

documents.title: radio 1 's figures on the up
text: radio 1 has recovered from record low audiences and now reaches 10.44 million listeners a week , according to new figures from ratings body rajar .
the station gained 737,000 listeners in the last quarter , thanks in part to new presenters clara amfo and annie mac .
breakfast dj nick grimshaw , above with mac , also increased his weekly reach by 344,000 to 5.84 million .
radio 2 remains the most listened-to station in the uk , with 15.14 million tuning in .

documents.title: clobbering time
text: and clobbering time continues today with

speaking to talking movies ' tom brook , however , the film 's cast members played down the reports of a troubled production that have swirled around this latest attempt to bring the marvel comic book quartet to the screen .

`` very few people in any kind of artistic enterprise can create something and not have it [ be ] open to public discussion , '' said actor miles teller , who plays reed richards - aka mr fantastic - in josh trank 's film .
`` this business has an exponential amount of critics and i think that 's an inevitable part of it . ''

documents.title: early hamlet review defended
text: times journalist kate maltby has defended her paper 's decision to publish an early review of benedict cumberbatch 's hamlet .
speaking on bbc radio 4 's today programme earlier , she agreed it was `` very unfair '' to give `` a final verdict on a production on the very first day '' .
yet she said her criticisms were chiefly levelled at the structure of the production , which she said would not change over the three-week preview period .
`` i do n't think it 's fair to judge things like the energy and the pace on the first night , '' she went on .
`` what you can judge is some of the structural decisions which are n't going to change . ''
here 's what actor eddie marsan tweeted in response .

documents.title: dennis waterman on 'wonderful ' cole
text: george cole was `` an amazing man '' and `` a wonderful actor '' according to dennis waterman , his long-time co-star on itv favourite minder .
in a statement , the new tricks actor revealed he had visited his friend and colleague earlier this week .
i am so sad to hear of george 's death .
his family must be devastated , and i am absolutely certain that anybody who ever knew him , will feel the same .
i 'm so grateful to have been a friend of this wonderful man .
we worked together for many years and my boast is that we laughed all day every day .
he was an amazing man , a wonderful actor and besotted with his family .
i had the privilege of spending tuesday afternoon with him and penny and , although very frail , his wit was as evident as ever .
farewell old friend .

documents.title: apprentice star death attributed to asthma
text: former apprentice candidate stuart baggs died as a result of his asthma , it has been confirmed .
the 27-year-old entrepreneur had the condition for many years , the isle of man constabulary said on thursday .
baggs ' body was found a week ago , after police were called to his home in douglas .
he reached the semi-final of the apprentice in 2010 and became famous for such one-liners as `` everything i touch turns to sold '' and `` i 'm stuart baggs the brand '' .

documents.title: gary webster on 'gentleman ' george
text: actor gary webster , who appeared opposite george cole on itv 's minder after dennis waterman left the show , has been sharing his memories of his former co-star with the bbc news channel .
he was so well-loved by so many people .
i feel honoured to have worked with him .
although he was advanced in years it 's still come a shock .
he was one of those characters you never felt you were going to be without .
he was a great guy , a genuine gentleman .
i would watch him and observe and realise where i was going wrong and make sure i followed his lead .
he grew up in london and knew those type of characters , and he made you realise there was an arthur daley in every family .
we 've all got an uncle , a brother , a cousin who 's just on the other side of what we might call the law .
coupled with his excellent comic timing and experience , it was a role he was almost destined to play .
he was a consummate professional .
he 's up there with the very finest of our greatest actors .
listen to gary webster 's tribute in full .

documents.title: aria for jobs
text: steve jobs is to be the subject of an opera .
the revolution of steve jobs will premiere in 2017 , the santa fe opera announced on wednesday .
the opera will look at `` the life and legacy of a distinctly american figure '' and will be written by composer mason bates with a libretto by mark campbell .

since his death from cancer in 2011 , the apple co-founder has been the focus of documentaries , books and a forthcoming film that has just been named as the closing night film gala at this year 's london film festival .

documents.title: george cole on minder
text: george cole 's career was defined by his memorable role as used car dealer arthur daley in long-running '80s series minder , originally written as a vehicle for dennis waterman .
cole was not the first choice for the arthur role .
but waterman 's preference , denholm elliott , was overruled by the show 's producers .
the series ran for 15 years , had 11 series and spawned catchphrases such as `` 'er indoors '' and `` nice little earner '' .
it also made cole an unlikely pop star when his duet with dennis waterman , what are we gon na get 'er indoors ? , reached the uk top 30 in 1983 .
cole was also known for playing 'flash harry ' , a spiv in the four st trinian 's films released between 1954 and 1966 .

documents.title: george cole statement
text: the death of actor george cole was announced by agent derek webster .
it is with deep regret that i have to announce the sad death of one of our most loved and respected actors .
george cole passed away yesterday at the royal berkshire hospital after a short illness .
his wife penny and his son toby were with him at his bedside . ''
read more on this story .

documents.title: breakinggeorge cole dies
text: george cole , known to millions as minder 's arthur daley , has died aged 90 .

documents.title: daily show set to become museum exhibit
text: the set of jon stewart 's daily show is to become a museum exhibit following stewart 's final show on thursday .
cathy trost , who oversees exhibits and programmes at the newseum , said she was `` thrilled '' by the donation .

she said the show 's fixtures were `` part of america 's cultural and media history , telling an important story about how political satire and news as humour made the daily show a trusted news source for a generation . ''
the stated mission of the newseum is to champion the five freedoms of the first amendment through exhibits and education .
trevor noah is set to take over hosting duties on the comedy central show .

documents.title: bake off rap
text: it seems the great british bake off really does have fans everywhere .
check out goldie lookin chain 's bake off rap , which salutes the bbc one ratings winner to the tune of taylor swift 's shake it off .
bake off rap - goldie lookin chain

documents.title: busta busted
text: us rapper busta rhymes has been arrested on an assault charge for allegedly throwing a protein shake at another man at a new york gym .
rhymes was at steel gym in the city 's chelsea neighbourhood when he got into a dispute with an employee and reportedly threw the drink at the back of his head .
the victim suffered a minor injury but refused medical attention ,
the singer - whose real name is trevor tahiem smith , jr. - was arrested at the scene and charged with second degree assault .
the hip-hop artist is best known for such hits as put your hands where my eyes could see , gim me some more and woo-hah ! !
got you all in check .

documents.title: bake off takes off
text: at one point last night , 10 million viewers were watching the great british bake off - 43 % of the entire viewing audience .
that 's quite a coup for the bbc one cooking challenge , whose opening show last year drew an average audience of 7.2 million .
with numbers like that , it surely wo n't be long before viewing figures exceed the 12.3 million who tuned in to see nancy birtwhistle named last year 's winner .
one budding baker was eliminated from the competition last night .
if you do n't want to know the person 's name , do n't read

documents.title: to review or not to review ?
text: there 's been some dissent on twitter over whether the times and other papers were right to run reviews of hamlet based on the production 's first preview .
times columnist david aaronovitch suggested his colleague kate maltby had shown courage in writing a negative review of such a keenly anticipated production .
but actor kerry shale called her actions `` unprofessional '' , while comedian david baddiel said it set `` a frightening precedent '' .
the negative review of benedict cumberbatch 's hamlet by @ twitterid in today 's @ twitterid is one of the bravest things i 've ever read .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid but it was a preview the first preview therefore should not have been reviewed
@ twitterid you understand more about these things than me , d. but sounds like much of this is endemic to the production .
@ twitterid
@ twitterid @ twitterid maybe but sets a frightening precedent for theatre-makers .
previews meant to be safe try-out space .
@ twitterid yes .
i see what you 're saying .
perhaps those days are gone .
@ twitterid
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid now theatres charge full price for previews , this luxury is outdated .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid it depends if tickets are reduced price for previews , or full price .
if the latter , not `` safe try-out '' .

documents.title: comedian 'wanted by swiss police '
text: comedian simon brodkin has been talking to bbc breakfast about the two high-profile stunts he pulled off this summer -
brodkin - known to some as lee nelson - said he had been allowed onto glasto 's pyramid stage without a pass on 27 june because he had the us rapper 's `` attitude and swagger '' .
`` if you act like you 're meant to be there , they let you in , '' he told the bbc 's colin paterson .
brodkin also said it had been his own money - $ 600 in $ 1 denominations - he flung at blatter in zurich on 20 july , a stunt for which
`` i am wanted by swiss police , so we 'll see what happens , '' the 37-year-old said on thursday .
`` it 'll be quite ironic if i 'm the first person to go to prison for what goes on at fifa hq . ''
brodkin was speaking at the edinburgh festival , where he is performing in the guise of his lee nelson character .

documents.title: mariah to star in empire
text: mariah carey is to guest star in the second series of empire , its producer has revealed .
lee daniels let slip the news as the singer received a star on the hollywood walk of fame .
`` watch her on empire , you guys .
she 's coming on empire , '' said daniels , who previously cast carey in his 2009 film precious .
jennifer hudson and naomi campbell are among other celebrities to have had roles in the hit tv series about an embattled hip-hop impresario .
carey , 45 , attended wednesday 's unveiling ceremony with her four-year-old twins , monroe and moroccan .
`` you 're melting my heart , '' she told the crowd .
`` you 're making me cry , and that 's why i 'm keeping on my sunglasses .
`` but i can not thank you enough .
this is a huge honour . ''
carey recently completed a residency at caesars palace in las vegas and will return there for more shows next february .

documents.title: gilmour records with ex-prisoner choir
text: pink floyd guitarist david gilmour has revealed that his new single features former inmates from the prison where his son charlie was incarcerated in 2011 .
gilmour recorded rattle that lock with the liberty choir , a rehab project that includes former wandsworth prison inmates and local singers .
charlie gilmour spent four months in jail after being convicted of violent disorder for his part in a protest against tuition fees .
`` charlie 's experience was something that has impacted on us and has made us more aware of the prison system and what could and should be done to improve it , '' gilmour told bbc news .
author: Ian Youngs
Arts reporter

documents.title: cumberbatch hamlet divides opinion
text: early reports of benedict cumberbatch 's first performance as hamlet at the barbican in london have been mixed , with two opposing opinions in the national press .
`` by the time he took his bows three hours later , drenched in sweat , the audience were on their feet , clamouring for more . ''
yet the times ' kate maltby was less impressed in a piece published online
`` cumberbatch has all the energy hamlet requires , sweating around the barbican stage like an oleaginous electric eel , but there 's little subtlety in this performance , '' she wrote .
`` this is hamlet for kids raised on moulin rouge , '' her two-star write-up continues .
`` it 's a wasted opportunity : pure theatrical self-indulgence . ''
proof that even cumberbatch ca n't please all the women , all the time .

documents.title: fantastic part for farrell
text: colin farrell has joined the cast of fantastic beasts and where to find them , the harry potter spin-off film starring eddie redmayne , which is out next year .

the irish actor will play graves , a wizard whom redmayne 's newt scamander meets in new york as he attempts to document magical creatures for the hogwarts school textbook that gives the film its title .
katherine waterston , the british actress seen in last year 's inherent vice , and ezra miller , of we need to talk about kevin fame , have also landed roles in the film .
the fantastic beasts film - based on a book jk rowling published in 2001 - is set 70 years before the events of her bestselling potter series .
author: The Hollywood Reporter

documents.title: get in touch
text: as ever , we 're keen to hear your thoughts on the day 's entertainment news .
let us know by tweeting
author: Neil Smith
Arts reporter

documents.title: morning all
text: welcome to thursday 's live page , bringing you all the latest news from the world of arts and entertainment .
stay tuned for early word on benedict cumberbatch as hamlet , jon stewart 's farewell to the daily show and cake shenanigans from bake off .
were you watching ?
author: Victoria Lindrea
Arts and entertainment reporter
